long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✅ Simplify the process of capturing and saving screenshots.
✅ Effortlessly save important information, create visual references, or collect design inspiration.
✅ Download screenshots directly from your browser with just a click of a button.
✅ Enhance productivity and streamline your workflow.
✅ Conveniently capture and store screenshots without the need for external applications.
✅ Improve collaboration by easily sharing captured screenshots with others.
✅ Enjoy a user-friendly and intuitive interface for a seamless screenshot capturing experience.
✅ Increase efficiency and save time by eliminating the need for manual cropping and editing of screenshots.
✅ Please feel free to modify and adapt these points to accurately represent the features and benefits of your Screenshot Assistant extension
